title: WTT: My Sovereign Bell beater for your Sovereign beater
author: HercDriver

posts.post_title: WTT: My Sovereign Bell beater for your Sovereign beater
posts.post_content:
Anybody have a beater to trade me?  I upgraded Mr. Bell, so looking to fill one of the numerous holes I have left in my collection.  Let me know!

Cheers,
Geno
